channel.title: SyFi Channel In need of developers
channel.description:
[center][b]Am making a development team.. Can be with the following 10+ I am not underestimating anyone if you are younger and claim to code you must prove it to me. The base We would be using is a old PI called caution-x Work has already been put into it but I and the rest of the developers quit due to us having to turn up with better things. So I am wanting to Reopen the Server files and see What can be done!
some pictures.[/b]
[b] Updates. Alex's Updates So far I fixed the problem when you character goes up to the player with range or magic and attacks like melee. Made the server a Little bit more stable Fixed the Problem when the player goes up to the player While in the wilderness. Added potion emptying. Added fully working Water filling. Added Beverages Beer Vodka Whiskys Rum.Etc Added Wilderness interface. Added Amulet of Glory Added Ring Of Dualing Added Games Necklass - Fixed animations for items; * Chaotic weaponry * Scimitars & longswords * Balmung - Added proper animations for; * Chaotic weaponry * Scimitars & longswords * Korasi * Balmung * More!
- Added flawless switching
- Cleaned up some classes
- Added proper block animations for; * Chaotics * Some other weapons * Defenders
Made it so cache will load from client and repacked the client.
If you wish to join use the following format!
Msn/Skype: Proof of Work(links, projects, etc...): How many hours a day can you work?: Why should I consider you: Anything else?:[/center][/b]
[URL=http://minus.com/lbrCruHajuZPOo][IMG]http://i.minus.com/jbrCruHajuZPOo.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://minus.com/lySh7bgdijGrq][IMG]http://i.minus.com/jySh7bgdijGrq.png[/img][/URL]

item.title: SyFi Channel In need of developers
item.dc:creator: @nolan2131 nolan2131
item.description:
@nolan2131 wrote:

Skype: nolan-peterson
Proof of Work(links, projects, etc…): Refer to my signature.
How many hours a day can you work?: 3 at the moment.
Why should I consider you: I have a mature attitude, and I can get along with anyone.
Anything else?: Thank you for considering me, good luck with your project.

Read full topic

item.title: SyFi Channel In need of developers
item.dc:creator: @kidgoku4522 kidgoku4522
item.description:
@kidgoku4522 wrote:

[center][b]Am making a development team…
Can be with the following 10+ I am not underestimating anyone if you are younger and claim to code you must prove it to me.
The base We would be using is a old PI called caution-x Work has already been put into it but I and the rest of the developers quit due to us having to turn up with better things.
So I am wanting to Reopen the Server files and see What can be done!

some pictures.[/b]

[b] Updates.
Alex’s Updates
So far I fixed the problem when you character goes up to the player with range or magic and attacks like melee.
Made the server a Little bit more stable
Fixed the Problem when the player goes up to the player While in the wilderness.
Added potion emptying.
Added fully working Water filling.
Added Beverages Beer Vodka Whiskys Rum.Etc
Added Wilderness interface.
Added Amulet of Glory
Added Ring Of Dualing
Added Games Necklass

  • Fixed animations for items;
  • Chaotic weaponry
  • Scimitars & longswords
  • Balmung
  • Added proper animations for;
  • Chaotic weaponry
  • Scimitars & longswords
  • Korasi
  • Balmung
  • More!

  • Added flawless switching

  • Cleaned up some classes

  • Added proper block animations for;

  • Chaotics
  • Some other weapons
  • Defenders

Made it so cache will load from client
and repacked the client.

If you wish to join use the following format!

Msn/Skype:
Proof of Work(links, projects, etc…):
How many hours a day can you work?:
Why should I consider you:
Anything else?:[/center][/b]


Read full topic
